the world’s chief, the bull of a man.
I made an offering of service;🔽I went for refuge
to the one with two feet, the one with fortitude.
I do not know of a bad destination,
the fruit of going for refuge.
I have done what the Buddha asked.”🔽Thus the elder Saraṇagamani recited these verses.
